const std::string &  subset

void Files::FileLister ( boost::filesystem::path  currentPath,
Files::PathContainer &  list,
bool  recursive 
)

Makes a list of files from a directory by taking a boost path and a Path Container and adds to the Path container all files in the path. It has a recursive option.

const std::string &  toFind,
bool  strict,
bool  ignoreExtensions

boost::filesystem::path Files::FileListLocator ( const Files::PathContainer &  list,
const boost::filesystem::path &  toFind,
bool  strict,
bool  ignoreExtensions 
)

Locates boost path in path container returns the path from the container that contains the searched path. If it's not found it returns and empty path Takes care of slashes, backslashes and it has a strict option.
